trans-unit.target: TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_Q1_000_010<tab>What would you like to do?
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_A1_000_011<tab>Learn about Gordias (Savage).
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_A1_000_012<tab>Enter <var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var> (Loot Rule: Normal).
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_A1_100_012<tab>Enter <var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var> (Loot Rule: Greed Only).
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_A1_101_012<tab>Enter <var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var> (Loot Rule: Lootmaster).
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_A1_000_013<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>Gordias (Savage) is comprised of multiple dungeons. Please be warned that the spell Return cannot be used in certain areas.
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Progress within Gordias (Savage) is saved at specific locations for each player, and you may resume your foray where you left off.

TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>Progress is reset every <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>To enter Gordias (Savage), you must be in a party of eight Disciples of War or Magic with a level of 60 or higher.
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_SYSTEM_000_054<tab>All members must also have completed the quest “A Song of Steam and Steel.”
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_SYSTEM_000_055<tab>The starting point is determined by the party leader's progress.
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_SYSTEM_000_056<tab>Even party members whose progress is different may participate, provided they meet the entry requirements.
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_SYSTEM_000_0561<tab>Those who have not advanced as far as the party leader will have their progress updated to be the same as that of the leader.
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_SYSTEM_000_057<tab>Those who have advanced further than the party leader, on the other hand, will retain their progress.

TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_SYSTEM_100_057<tab>In this latter case, you will not receive rewards from dungeons that you have already completed, and the number of coffers that pop will be adjusted accordingly.
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_SYSTEM_000_058<tab>All forays into Gordias (Savage) are limited to 90 minutes (Earth time).
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_SYSTEM_000_059<tab>All items in a player's loot list will automatically be transferred to that player's inventory upon all other party members leaving the area.
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>Items unable to be obtained will be lost.
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_Q2_000_100<tab>Enter <var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var> (Loot Rule: Normal)?
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_Q2_100_100<tab>Enter <var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var> (Loot Rule: Greed Only)?
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_Q2_101_100<tab>Enter <var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var> (Loot Rule: Lootmaster)?
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_A2_000_101<tab>Yes
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_A2_000_102<tab>No
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>You were unable to enter <var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80304 /var>. Make sure that you and your party meet all the conditions.
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_SYSTEM_000_210<tab>You have recently completed Gordias (Savage), and cannot enter again until progress is reset.

TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_SYSTEM_000_211<tab>Progress is reset every <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_Q3_000_300<tab>Awaiting entry confirmation from party members.
TEXT_RAIDGUIDETRAVEL30_A3_000_301<tab>Cancel
